summary: Ajouter au tableau de bord un dossier technique permettant de stocker des fichiers (PDF, photos, vidéos) indépendamment des dossiers clients.

existing_features.title: Add a new authenticated route and page for the Technical Folder in the dashboard area, and provide a clear navigation entry point from the main dashboard (clients list).
Implement the Technical Folder UI to upload and display files (PDF, images, videos) independently of client dossiers.

Extend the existing media/file picking components (or add a new file picker component) so the app can select PDFs in addition to the current image/video support, without breaking existing intervention/blacklist media flows.
Add React Query hooks for Technical Folder operations (list, upload, delete) that call the new backend methods and provide basic error handling consistent with existing hooks.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ajouter au tableau de bord un « dossier technique » pour stocker des fichiers (PDF, photos, vidéos) indépendamment des dossiers clients
Add backend support for a global (non-client-specific) “Technical Folder” that stores uploaded files (PDF, image, and video) and allows authenticated users to list, upload, and delete files.
